sentences.en: "It know it sounds horrible to say this, but geologically speaking, it was not a big earthquake at all," says Alessandro Martelli, a professor of antiseismic engineering at the University of Ferrara.
sentences.cn: 我知道这样说可能让人反感，但从地质学角度看，这并算不上太严重的地震，费拉拉大学地震预防工程师亚里山大.马特利说。

sentences.en: Apollo astronauts used seismometers during their visits to the Moon and discovered that the gray orb isn't a totally dead place, geologically speaking.
sentences.cn: 阿波罗航天飞船的宇航员们登月时使用地震检波器发现：这个灰色的星球，从地质学角度上讲，并不完全是一个死气沉沉的地方。

sentences.en: Geologically , this big - sky land seems an odd cross between Kansas and West Texas hill country.
sentences.cn: 从地理上讲, 此处仿佛是堪萨斯州和西德克萨斯的丘陵地带中间的一片开阔地.

sentences.en: Geologically speaking, the park's landscape was formed by two processes: mountain - building and glaciation.
sentences.cn: 地质上说, 公园的景观形成了两个过程: 山区建设和冰川.

sentences.en: Geologically speaking, this area is extremely interesting.
sentences.cn: 从地质学上来说, 这个地方是极为有趣的.

sentences.en: Geologically, not all volcanoes are the same.
sentences.cn: 从地质学来说, 并不是所有火山都是相同的.

sentences.en: On the right of the image, sunlight bathes the anti - Saturn side of this geologically active moon.
sentences.cn: 在右边的形象, 阳光的沐浴anti-Saturn这个地质活跃的月亮.

sentences.en: The Nabro volcano has not erupted in recorded human history, but lava flows near the volcano are relatively recent geologically.
sentences.cn: 在有人类记载的历史中，纳布诺火山并未喷发，但火山附近的熔岩流是相对较新的地质。

sentences.en: This paper discusses geologically and geochemically the genesis of Erentaolegai Silver deposit.
sentences.cn: 本文从地质学及地球化学两方面探讨了额仁陶勒盖银矿床的成因.
